page.title: 18FARM MACHINERY
page.content: The farms make extensive use of machinery. Each farm has at least one tractor and the larger ones have 5 or 6. In total there are 31 tractors between the 10 farms.Several trailers (23), ploughs (20), and harrowers (22) per farm are also common.All farms have at least one baler, one muck spreader, and one seeder,and all but the smallest have a combine harvester and a crop sprayer.There are also a variety of other less common machines. All the farms have a farm house and 6 have at least one other house or cottage. Barns, reeds, stores and byres are typical farm buildings and most farms have more than one of each. The larger farms have as many as a dozen main buildings, together with machinery sheds.
